Exciting news! Our short film ‚ÄúDream To Cure Water‚Äù is a finalist at the prestigious @jacksonwildorg film festival in the ‚ÄúClimate Stories - Short Form‚Äù category.

We‚Äôre thrilled to unveil the trailer, showcasing two Peruvian mountain communities uniting ancestral traditions and cutting-edge science to combat climate change‚Äôs impact on their water source.

Watch the trailer on Vimeo (link in my profile) for the full experience.
#DreamToCureWater #JacksonWildSummit

Huge thanks to our dedicated team for their hard work and unwavering commitment. 
Special thanks also to @insidenatgeo and @theclimatepledge for all the support and funding the film.

Very happy to announce that I am now represented by @lairdandgoodcompany . It is a dream come true to be part of a global production team with offices in New York and London. As we launch our partnership today I am also happy to share a video about my work. 

Follow link in my profile to see my new portfolios on Laird & Good Company.

My story about skiing in Caucasus Mountains in Georgia is live today on @natgeo! I am thrilled to finally share this series that I worked on last year. Traveling to Ushguli, which is protected by UNESCO, has been on my bucket list for a long time, and it‚Äôs one of those timeless places you can‚Äôt help but return to. Huge thanks to the amazing assistance of @shako_margiani and @maticek. Thanks also to great @natgeo team @rebekahbellbarlas and @maurafriedman. 

Please follow the link in my profile to read the story on @natgeo. I‚Äôll be sharing more from this trip in the coming days, so stay tuned.
#natgeo #skitouring #georgia #svaneti #ushguli #leica #leicaSL

My story about skiing in Caucasus Mountains in Georgia is live today on @natgeo! I am thrilled to finally share this series that I worked on last year. Traveling to Ushguli, which is protected by UNESCO, has been on my bucket list for a long time, and it's one of those timeless places you can't help but return to. Huge thanks to the amazing assistance of @shako_margiani and @maticek. 

Ushguli is considered the highest permanently inhabited point in Europe. According to the publicist Besarion Nizharadze, the name Ushguli, as a toponym, originates from 'fearless heart'. Thanks for great editing to photo editor @maurafriedman @natgeo. 

Please follow the link in my profile to read the story on @natgeo. I'll be sharing more from this trip in the coming days, so stay tuned.
#natgeo #skitouring #georgia #svaneti #ushguli #leica #leicaSL

‚ÄòWhat's the Correct Color of a Bee?‚Äô made the @nytimes list of top dispatches in 2023 and WON 1st honorable mention in the outstanding features category at the SEJ‚Äôs awards for reporting on the environment! ‚ú® SEJ - The Society of Environmental Journalists is association of professional journalists dedicated to more and better coverage of environment-related issues. It was great to work on this story with the incredible writer @denisehruby. The photographs were captured in Austrian's state of Carinthia, where the law favors light-colored local bees. @nytimes @sejournalists @boshnaqmona @adamjdean @leica_akademie_austria #nytimes #award #beekeepers #leica

I was incredibly fortunate to discover the Mre≈ænica River in Croatia last year while working on the River Champions campaign for @nature_org . The Mre≈ænica River is a natural gem, and we were privileged to collaborate with some remarkable and passionate individuals who really care about river conservation in the Balkans. @toorkish_coffee Asim Ugljen, a well known Croatian actor, kayaker and a father who loves spending time on the Mre≈ænica River shared his story with us. Thank you, Asim, for your time and inspiration.

Thanks also to Kre≈°o Rogoz @krogoz and @croatiaopenlandtoursfor logistic support and raft/kayak guidance. If you wish to explore the Mre≈ænica river do not hesitate to contact Kre≈°o to help you discover the river. @croatiaopenlandtours

The Western Balkans region is home to some of Europe‚Äôs last free-flowing rivers. There is a growing movement of people who are fighting to protect these unique ecosystems for generations to come. We were given the task to produce 8 short films about river champions and guardians, from scientists to locals who are trying to protect rivers in the Balkans.

#riverchampions #thenatureconservancy #unitedforrivers #tentfilm

I am honored to serve as a nominator for the LOBA 2024 once again. The Leica Oskar Barnack Award is one of the most important photography awards, and I will never forget when I received this  recognition in 2013. We are actively seeking bodies of work centered around the theme of the relationship between humans and their environment.

If you believe you have a compelling and relevant series, please feel free to send me an email at ciril@tentfilm.com, including your work and an artistic statement. Additionally, you are welcome to tag someone whom you believe deserves this recognition. 

Attached are some photos from my LOBA-winning series 'Waiting to Move,' captured during my expedition to Shishmaref, Sarichef Island, Alaska. The purpose of this journey was to document the effects of climate change on the lives of the InÃÉupiat people.
@leica_camera @leica_camera_austria

Hope you have a heartfelt holiday wherever you are and close to the people you care about. We live in a fast-changing, unpredictable world with so much imbalance and unfairness. Thinking of those who are not so lucky to live in peace or without a roof over their heads. Here is a clip from a recent trip to Northwest of Greenland where I work on a new documentary project with @insidenatgeo National Geographic Society.  #MerryChristmas

I've spent a few days in NYC attending the screening of my film 'Dream to Cure Water.' There was unique winter light and I just has to do some street photography. It's all about breaking the ice with a simple question: "May I take your picture?" Allow me to introduce Olivia, a medical student and photographer, whom I encountered near the Meatpacking District. All these were taken with the Leica M11 and 50mm Summilux-M. @leica_camera_austria @lairdandgoodcompany
